dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.chooseHowToUse: Choose how you want to use Beswib
dashboard.buyCta: I want to buy a bib
dashboard.sellCta: I want to sell a bib
dashboard.gettingStartedDesc: New to Beswib? Here's how to get started quickly.
dashboard.stepBrowse: Browse available race bibs in our marketplace
dashboard.stepList: List your own bibs for sale when plans change
dashboard.platformActivityDesc: See what's happening on Beswib today.
dashboard.runnerProfileIncomplete: Your runner profile is incomplete. Please update it to be able to buy bibs.
dashboard.sellerProfileIncomplete: Your seller profile is incomplete. Please update it to be able to sell bibs.

buyer.title: Buyer Dashboard
buyer.description: View your purchases and manage your waitlist entries.

seller.title: Seller Dashboard
seller.description: Manage your bib listings and view your sales.

auth.signInToAccessDashboard: Please sign in to access your dashboard.

dashboard.title: Tableau de bord
dashboard.chooseHowToUse: Choisissez comment vous voulez utiliser Beswib
dashboard.cantFindEvent: Je ne trouve pas mon événement
dashboard.gettingStartedDesc: Nouveau sur Beswib ? Voici comment démarrer rapidement.
dashboard.stepBrowse: Parcourez les dossards disponibles sur notre marché
dashboard.stepList: Mettez en vente vos dossards quand vos plans changent
dashboard.stepConnect: Connectez-vous à la communauté des coureurs
dashboard.platformActivityDesc: Découvrez ce qui se passe aujourd'hui sur Beswib.
dashboard.runnerProfileIncomplete: Votre profil coureur est incomplet. Mettez-le à jour pour pouvoir acheter des dossards.
dashboard.sellerProfileIncomplete: Votre profil vendeur est incomplet. Mettez-le à jour pour pouvoir vendre des dossards.

buyer.title: Tableau de bord acheteur
buyer.description: Consultez vos achats et gérez vos inscriptions en liste d'attente.

seller.title: Tableau de bord vendeur
seller.description: Gérez vos annonces de dossards et consultez vos ventes.

auth.signInToAccessDashboard: Veuillez vous connecter pour accéder à votre tableau de bord.

buyer.title: 구매자 대시보드
buyer.description: 구매 내역을 보고 대기 목록 항목을 관리하세요.
